name: NSScrubberDataSource
desc: A set of methods that a scrubber data source object implements to provide items to the scrubber from an associated data collection in your app.

items.name: func numberOfItems(for: NSScrubber) -> Int
items.desc: Asks the data source for the number of items in the scrubber.

items.name: func scrubber(NSScrubber, viewForItemAt: Int) -> NSScrubberItemView
items.desc: Asks the data source object for the view the corresponds to the specified item in the scrubber.
